alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Grant; Jackson; Natchitoches; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 4:39PM CDT until April 13 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Grant Parish in north central Louisiana... Southern Jackson Parish in north central Louisiana... Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Winn Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 439 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles northeast of Campti to near Natchitoches to 16 miles north of Kurthwood, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Winnfield, Jonesboro, Colfax, Campti, Montgomery, Provencal, Natchez, Clarence, Pollock, Dry Prong, Goldonna, Dodson, Georgetown, Saline, Calvin, Atlanta, Powhatan, Sikes and Cloutierville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central and northwestern Louisiana.
